response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,500,000, reflecting its quality, rarity, and the impact it has had on my life.

Considering the significance of this product, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $1,250,000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the potential value it could hold for you. I understand that the value of such items is subjective and varies greatly from person to person. However, I am confident that you will find its worth far beyond the monetary figure.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
